section.32: Dialects and Readings of the Qur'an (Kitab Al-Huruf Wa Al-Qira'at)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Dharr:I was sitting behind the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) who was riding a donkey while the sun was setting. He asked: Do you know where this sets ? I replied: Allah and his Apostle know best. He said: It sets in a spring of warm water (Hamiyah)
